entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 7:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 8.2°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy with flurries beginning before morning. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
